on reading compounds: 堅持【ケンジ】holding on to, sticking to
護持【ゴジ】defend and maintain, support, protection
kun reading compounds: 持つ【もつ】to hold (in one's hand), to take, to carry, to possess, to have, to own, to maintain, to keep, to last, to be durable, to keep, to survive, to take charge of, to be in charge of
持子【もつご】topmouth gudgeon, stone moroko (Pseudorasbora parva)

持てる【もてる】to be able to possess (hold, get, etc.), to be well liked, to be popular, to be pampered (spoiled, doted upon, etc.), to be welcomed, to endure (the tests of time, the elements, etc.), to last, possessed, held, rich, wealthy, affluent
持てる者と持たざる者【もてるものともたざるもの】haves and have-nots
